title: Covid-19: Face masks required in more indoor venues in England
content:
1. Covid-19: Face masks required in more indoor venues in England  BBC News
  2. Amid scandal over breaking its own COVID rules, U.K. government reimposes restrictions to fight Omicron  CBS News

  4. Stricter measures than plan B may be needed to rein in UK’s Omicron growth  The Guardian
  5. Sajid Javid rules out 'unethical' mandatory Covid vaccination  The Independent
